<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope
  xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
  xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
  xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"
  xmlns:wsdd="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/04/discovery"
  xmlns:chan="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2005/02/duplex"
  xmlns:wsa5="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"
  xmlns:xmime="http://tempuri.org/xmime.xsd"
  xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include"
  xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema"
  xmlns:wsrfbf="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/bf-2"
  xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1"
  xmlns:ns3="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/pacs"
  xmlns:wsrfr="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/r-2"
  xmlns:ns1="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/actionengine/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns2="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/accesscontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns4="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns5="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/advancedsecurity/wsdl"
  xmlns:tad="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/analyticsdevice/wsdl"
  xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl"
  xmlns:tdn="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/network/wsdl"
  xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl"
  xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl"
  xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2"
  xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl"
  xmlns:tls="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/display/wsdl"
  xmlns:tmd="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/deviceIO/wsdl"
  xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl"
  xmlns:trc="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/recording/wsdl"
  xmlns:trp="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/replay/wsdl"
  xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl"
  xmlns:trv="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/receiver/wsdl"
  xmlns:tse="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/search/wsdl">
 <SOAP-ENV:Header>
 </SOAP-ENV:Header>
 <SOAP-ENV:Body>
   <tptz:AbsoluteMove>
    <tptz:ProfileToken></tptz:ProfileToken>
    <tptz:Position>
     <tt:PanTilt x="0.0" y="0.0" space="">
     </tt:PanTilt>
     <tt:Zoom x="0.0" space="">
     </tt:Zoom>
    </tptz:Position>
    <tptz:Speed>
     <tt:PanTilt x="0.0" y="0.0" space="">
     </tt:PanTilt>
     <tt:Zoom x="0.0" space="">
     </tt:Zoom>
    </tptz:Speed>
   </tptz:AbsoluteMove>
 </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope
  xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
  xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
  xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"
  xmlns:wsdd="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/04/discovery"
  xmlns:chan="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2005/02/duplex"
  xmlns:wsa5="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"
  xmlns:xmime="http://tempuri.org/xmime.xsd"
  xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include"
  xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema"
  xmlns:wsrfbf="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/bf-2"
  xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1"
  xmlns:ns3="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/pacs"
  xmlns:wsrfr="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/r-2"
  xmlns:ns1="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/actionengine/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns2="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/accesscontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns4="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns5="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/advancedsecurity/wsdl"
  xmlns:tad="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/analyticsdevice/wsdl"
  xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl"
  xmlns:tdn="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/network/wsdl"
  xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl"
  xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl"
  xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2"
  xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl"
  xmlns:tls="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/display/wsdl"
  xmlns:tmd="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/deviceIO/wsdl"
  xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl"
  xmlns:trc="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/recording/wsdl"
  xmlns:trp="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/replay/wsdl"
  xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl"
  xmlns:trv="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/receiver/wsdl"
  xmlns:tse="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/search/wsdl">
 <SOAP-ENV:Header>
 </SOAP-ENV:Header>
 <SOAP-ENV:Body>
   <tptz:GotoPreset>
    <tptz:ProfileToken></tptz:ProfileToken>
    <tptz:PresetToken></tptz:PresetToken>
    <tptz:Speed>
     <tt:PanTilt x="0.0" y="0.0" space="">
     </tt:PanTilt>
     <tt:Zoom x="0.0" space="">
     </tt:Zoom>
    </tptz:Speed>
   </tptz:GotoPreset>
 </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

<s:Envelope
    xmlns:a="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"
    xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
    <s:Header>
        <a:Action s:mustUnderstand="1">http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl/ModifyPresetTour</a:Action>
        <a:MessageID>urn:uuid:e4c1fe5a-1680-4269-a1ba-7d3abea2616b</a:MessageID>
        <a:ReplyTo>
            <a:Address>http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/anonymous</a:Address>
        </a:ReplyTo>
        <a:To s:mustUnderstand="1">https://10.20.1.1/nvt/media/0730bc08-79f4-4da8-bcf3-2912132a8f41</a:To>
    </s:Header>
    <s:Body
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
        <ModifyPresetTour
            xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl">
            <ProfileToken>1</ProfileToken>
            <PresetTour token="1">
                <Name
                    xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">5 пресетов</Name>
                <Status
                    xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
                    <State>Idle</State>
                </Status>
                <AutoStart
                    xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">false
                </AutoStart>
                <StartingCondition RandomPresetOrder="false"
                    xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" />
                    <TourSpot
                        xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
                        <PresetDetail>
                            <PresetToken>1</PresetToken>
                        </PresetDetail>
                        <Speed>
                            <PanTilt x="0" y="0" />
                            <Zoom x="0" />
                        </Speed>
                        <StayTime>PT0H0M0.0S</StayTime>
                    </TourSpot>
                    <TourSpot
                        xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
                        <PresetDetail>
                            <PresetToken>2</PresetToken>
                        </PresetDetail>
                        <Speed>
                            <PanTilt x="0" y="0" />
                            <Zoom x="0" />
                        </Speed>
                        <StayTime>PT0H0M0.0S</StayTime>
                    </TourSpot>
                    <TourSpot
                        xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
                        <PresetDetail>
                            <PresetToken>3</PresetToken>
                        </PresetDetail>
                        <Speed>
                            <PanTilt x="0" y="0" />
                            <Zoom x="0" />
                        </Speed>
                        <StayTime>PT0H0M0.0S</StayTime>
                    </TourSpot>
                    <TourSpot
                        xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
                        <PresetDetail>
                            <PresetToken>5</PresetToken>
                        </PresetDetail>
                        <Speed>
                            <PanTilt x="0" y="0" />
                            <Zoom x="0" />
                        </Speed>
                        <StayTime>PT0H0M0.0S</StayTime>
                    </TourSpot>
                    <TourSpot
                        xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
                        <PresetDetail>
                            <PresetToken>6</PresetToken>
                        </PresetDetail>
                        <Speed>
                            <PanTilt x="0" y="0" />
                            <Zoom x="0" />
                        </Speed>
                        <StayTime>PT0H0M0.0S</StayTime>
                    </TourSpot>
                </PresetTour>
            </ModifyPresetTour>
        </s:Body>
    </s:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope
  xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
  xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
  xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"
  xmlns:wsdd="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/04/discovery"
  xmlns:chan="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2005/02/duplex"
  xmlns:wsa5="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"
  xmlns:xmime="http://tempuri.org/xmime.xsd"
  xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include"
  xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema"
  xmlns:wsrfbf="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/bf-2"
  xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1"
  xmlns:ns3="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/pacs"
  xmlns:wsrfr="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/r-2"
  xmlns:ns1="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/actionengine/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns2="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/accesscontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns4="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns5="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/advancedsecurity/wsdl"
  xmlns:tad="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/analyticsdevice/wsdl"
  xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl"
  xmlns:tdn="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/network/wsdl"
  xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl"
  xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl"
  xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2"
  xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl"
  xmlns:tls="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/display/wsdl"
  xmlns:tmd="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/deviceIO/wsdl"
  xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl"
  xmlns:trc="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/recording/wsdl"
  xmlns:trp="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/replay/wsdl"
  xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl"
  xmlns:trv="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/receiver/wsdl"
  xmlns:tse="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/search/wsdl">
 <SOAP-ENV:Header>
 </SOAP-ENV:Header>
 <SOAP-ENV:Body>
   <tptz:RelativeMove>
    <tptz:ProfileToken></tptz:ProfileToken>
    <tptz:Translation>
     <tt:PanTilt x="0.0" y="0.0" space="">
     </tt:PanTilt>
     <tt:Zoom x="0.0" space="">
     </tt:Zoom>
    </tptz:Translation>
    <tptz:Speed>
     <tt:PanTilt x="0.0" y="0.0" space="">
     </tt:PanTilt>
     <tt:Zoom x="0.0" space="">
     </tt:Zoom>
    </tptz:Speed>
   </tptz:RelativeMove>
 </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope
  xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
  xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
  xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing"
  xmlns:wsdd="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/04/discovery"
  xmlns:chan="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2005/02/duplex"
  xmlns:wsa5="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"
  xmlns:xmime="http://tempuri.org/xmime.xsd"
  xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include"
  xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema"
  xmlns:wsrfbf="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/bf-2"
  xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1"
  xmlns:ns3="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/pacs"
  xmlns:wsrfr="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/r-2"
  xmlns:ns1="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/actionengine/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns2="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/accesscontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns4="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl"
  xmlns:ns5="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/advancedsecurity/wsdl"
  xmlns:tad="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/analyticsdevice/wsdl"
  xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl"
  xmlns:tdn="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/network/wsdl"
  xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl"
  xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl"
  xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2"
  xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl"
  xmlns:tls="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/display/wsdl"
  xmlns:tmd="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/deviceIO/wsdl"
  xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl"
  xmlns:trc="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/recording/wsdl"
  xmlns:trp="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/replay/wsdl"
  xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl"
  xmlns:trv="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/receiver/wsdl"
  xmlns:tse="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/search/wsdl">
 <SOAP-ENV:Header>
 </SOAP-ENV:Header>
 <SOAP-ENV:Body>
   <timg:SetImagingSettings>
    <timg:VideoSourceToken></timg:VideoSourceToken>
    <timg:ImagingSettings>
     <tt:BacklightCompensation>
      <tt:Mode>OFF</tt:Mode>
      <tt:Level>0.0</tt:Level>
     </tt:BacklightCompensation>
     <tt:Brightness>0.0</tt:Brightness>
     <tt:ColorSaturation>0.0</tt:ColorSaturation>
     <tt:Contrast>0.0</tt:Contrast>
     <tt:Exposure>
      <tt:Mode>AUTO</tt:Mode>
      <tt:Priority>LowNoise</tt:Priority>
      <tt:Window bottom="0.0" top="0.0" right="0.0" left="0.0">
      </tt:Window>
      <tt:MinExposureTime>0.0</tt:MinExposureTime>
      <tt:MaxExposureTime>0.0</tt:MaxExposureTime>
      <tt:MinGain>0.0</tt:MinGain>
      <tt:MaxGain>0.0</tt:MaxGain>
      <tt:MinIris>0.0</tt:MinIris>
      <tt:MaxIris>0.0</tt:MaxIris>
      <tt:ExposureTime>0.0</tt:ExposureTime>
      <tt:Gain>0.0</tt:Gain>
      <tt:Iris>0.0</tt:Iris>
     </tt:Exposure>
     <tt:Focus>
      <tt:AutoFocusMode>AUTO</tt:AutoFocusMode>
      <tt:DefaultSpeed>0.0</tt:DefaultSpeed>
      <tt:NearLimit>0.0</tt:NearLimit>
      <tt:FarLimit>0.0</tt:FarLimit>
      <tt:Extension>
      </tt:Extension>
     </tt:Focus>
     <tt:IrCutFilter>ON</tt:IrCutFilter>
     <tt:Sharpness>0.0</tt:Sharpness>
     <tt:WideDynamicRange>
      <tt:Mode>OFF</tt:Mode>
      <tt:Level>0.0</tt:Level>
     </tt:WideDynamicRange>
     <tt:WhiteBalance>
      <tt:Mode>AUTO</tt:Mode>
      <tt:CrGain>0.0</tt:CrGain>
      <tt:CbGain>0.0</tt:CbGain>
      <tt:Extension>
      </tt:Extension>
     </tt:WhiteBalance>
     <tt:Extension>
      <tt:ImageStabilization>
       <tt:Mode>OFF</tt:Mode>
       <tt:Level>0.0</tt:Level>
       <tt:Extension>
       </tt:Extension>
      </tt:ImageStabilization>
      <tt:Extension>
       <tt:IrCutFilterAutoAdjustment>
        <tt:BoundaryType></tt:BoundaryType>
        <tt:BoundaryOffset>0.0</tt:BoundaryOffset>
        <tt:ResponseTime>0</tt:ResponseTime>
        <tt:Extension>
        </tt:Extension>
       </tt:IrCutFilterAutoAdjustment>
       <tt:IrCutFilterAutoAdjustment>
        <tt:BoundaryType></tt:BoundaryType>
        <tt:BoundaryOffset>0.0</tt:BoundaryOffset>
        <tt:ResponseTime>0</tt:ResponseTime>
        <tt:Extension>
        </tt:Extension>
       </tt:IrCutFilterAutoAdjustment>
       <tt:Extension>
        <tt:ToneCompensation>
         <tt:Mode></tt:Mode>
         <tt:Level>0.0</tt:Level>
         <tt:Extension>
         </tt:Extension>
        </tt:ToneCompensation>
        <tt:Defogging>
         <tt:Mode></tt:Mode>
         <tt:Level>0.0</tt:Level>
         <tt:Extension>
         </tt:Extension>
        </tt:Defogging>
        <tt:NoiseReduction>
         <tt:Level>0.0</tt:Level>
        </tt:NoiseReduction>
        <tt:Extension>
        </tt:Extension>
       </tt:Extension>
      </tt:Extension>
     </tt:Extension>
    </timg:ImagingSettings>
    <timg:ForcePersistence>false</timg:ForcePersistence>
   </timg:SetImagingSettings>
 </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
